title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES HIRES REGIONAL SALES MANAGER

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced today that it has signed Michael Fantaski as a Regional Manager for the Western Region.

Mr. Fantaski most recently served as director of sales for Flightcraft and prior to that spent 11 years with Dassault Falcon Jet as a regional sales manager.

In his new role, Mr. Fantaski will be covering sales for the Western United States and Canada for both Professional Aircraft Accessories and its sister company Professional Aviation Associates.

He holds a Bachelor of Arts in Industrial Relations Management from Boise State University.
